name: picky (floere)
description: [项目级] Picky is an easy to use and fast Ruby semantic search engine that helps your users find what they are looking for.。来源: https://github.com/floere/picky

genes.title: 项目概述
genes.content:
Picky is an easy to use and fast Ruby semantic search engine that helps your users find what they are looking for.

来源: https://github.com/floere/picky
